content.tagline: Perfectly Prepared for Your Digital Day
content.text:
Count on the Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga for nonstop performance in your digital workday. The 2-in-1 device is designed for always-on productivity, powered by an Intel® Core™ i7 vPro™ processor. With a versatile multimode design, LTE-A connectivity, and a brilliant OLED display, the possibilities are endless.

Get the flexibility that matters—and the power to handle any task at any time—with the ThinkPad X1 Yoga.

features.name: Do More with Multimode Freedom
features.text: The ThinkPad X1 Yoga keeps you connected and ultra-productive, using the computing mode (Laptop, Tablet, Tent or Stand) that best fits your business needs. At just 2.8 lb./1.27 kg light and 0.7 inch/17.8 mm thin, the 2-in-1 convertible works the way you do.

features.name: Experience Brilliance
features.text: The ThinkPad X1 Yoga features a stunning 14-inch 2K (2560 x 1440) touchscreen display, with optional OLED technology. It enables your work, videos, photos, and web pages to look better than ever with richer colors and sharper contrast.

features.name: Collaborate with Ease
features.text: In addition to its vibrant display, the ThinkPad X1 Yoga comes with VOIP-optimized A/V features and optional LTE-A wireless connectivity—for easy collaboration across the table or around the world. Plus, it’s powered by up to 11 hours of battery life.

features.name: Business-Ready Durability
features.text: The ThinkPad X1 Yoga delivers the deep dependability required by modern business. The innovative form factor has endured military-grade durability testing, and features both scratch- and spill-resistant displays and keyboards.
